title: Aen 1 340-342 - SS sight - History - Punic Wars

content.question: The wars between Carthage and Rome culminated in 146 BCE with

choices.label: the sack of the city of Carthage
a truce between Carthage and Rome

content.answer: the sack of the city of Carthage
